items.sentence: Do you really think you can convince Tom to do that?
I wish there were a better translation of this book.
I still haven\'t done everything you asked me to do.
Tom doesn\'t live very far from where that happened.
I\'m looking for something to clean the carpet with.
I\'m looking forward to spending some time with you.
I\'m on my way to meet Tom at the station right now.
I don\'t want what I\'m about to say to be recorded.
Maybe it would\'ve been better if I hadn\'t done it.
I figured you wouldn\'t want to go there without me.
